DOC.brief_title: Effects Of Repeat Inhaled Doses Of GW597901X On Patient Safety And Lung Function In Asthmatic Subjects
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion : Subjects mild moderate stable asthma lung problem . Male subject female subject able get pregnant ( e.g . postmenopausal surgically sterile ) . NonSmokers . Subjects show measurable improvement function lung single dose salbutamol . Exclusion criterion : Any significant illness . Subjects heart problem .
